name: Europe's NEWEST High Speed Train: ÖBB's New Railjet through the Alps!
description:
Austria's new Railjet is stunning! I rode on one of the very first trains in commercial service from Munich to Bologna on RJ 87, and I was pretty impressed by this seriously swish new train set! We'll look at first class, business class and economy on this nearly 7 hour run via the Brenner Pass - one of Europe's stunning rail routes through the Alps.

Follow me on Twitter: @paul_winginit ¦ https://twitter.com/paul_winginit
Follow me on Instagram: paul_winginit ¦ https://www.instagram.com/paul_winginit
NEW: Follow me on TikTok: @paul_winginit ¦ https://www.tiktok.com/@paul_winginit

Many thanks to @SuperalbsTravels for allowing the use of his clip of the older Railjet cars in the intro! He's reviewed the older trains: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aZTK8ldQWcg

https://don.at/en/references/dons-on-oebb-long-distance-trains-2/

I made a Bright Trip guide: https://www.brighttrip.com/europebytrain
Merch store: https://wingin-it.teemill.com/collection/all-products/
Preferred VPN: https://surfshark.deals/winginit - promo code WINGINIT for discount

0:00 Intro
0:51 Munich Hbf - a strange station!
1:47 Arrival and boarding our New Generation Railjet!
3:13 Business and First Class
4:35 Departure of our train from Munich 
5:55 Some unusual design choices on this train + economy 
7:28 Business Class seat review
9:28 Innsbruck, and a change of train (!)
10:25 Stunning Brenner Pass 
12:29 Dining car on the new Railjet
15:15 Conclusions, thanks - see you next time!
